title: shonna nAvinukkudu
sahitya:
shonna nAvinikkudu sorga sukham pirakkudu shOlai malaik-karashan sundaran nAmam tanai


anupallavi

  enna mAyam sheidAnO Edum ariyEn pEdai EdEdu ini avan inri muDiyAdu


caraNam    tuLLum shilambAruDai shOlai malai shezhippil kiLLai konja kuyil pADa mayilADa kaLLa vESa emmAnn
 pavani azhagaikk-kaNDu uLLam vashamizhandu uDalum avanadenru urugi urugi nAmam uraittiDum pOdinil
